File /secure/simul_efun/back_trace.c

Cotains some simul_efuns.

Written by Pinkfish

Method index

back_trace()
This method returns out the call stack traces.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
back_trace
string back_trace()
This method returns out the call stack traces. It is usualy called in the error handling routines in the master object but it can be used elsewhere for debuggin purposes. You can see the results of this function in /log/runtime and /log/catch.

Returns:
call stack trace
